subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: The case for faces.
author: Adrienne B
full_text:
Yes, wow.. I don't know what to say.  I've belonged to the group for 3-4
days. Your reputation and experience/experiments were  the main reason and I
learned afterwards of the others with experience.  I can only apologize if
my question was the straw.  Thank you for explaining the history, Frank.
 Sorry it's been so wearing on you.  Hope you find what you're looking for.

On Sun, Jan 2, 2011 at 12:39 PM, purplespacefriend <
purplealiengirl@gmail.com> wrote:

>
>
> Well, for one thing, I don't own the group anymore. Due to one of these
> incessent argurments, I had to back away from this some years ago as I
> almost got fired becuase yet someone else that thought they knew so much
> more forwarded all my e-mails to my boss.
>
> Then someone else seemed to be insinuating that I may have tampered with
> the imgaes. Very insulting. This stuff goes on an on, regardless of the
> quality of voices, or the images. I have reached my saturation point. There
> seems to be nothing more to be gained by presenting anything else. Now, I
> can sympatize with Richard Roberts!
>
> The group will continue, as there are a number of box and paranormal
> experts here that are more than happy to tell everyone what this stuff
> really is and how it works.
>
> I didn't mean to create bad any feelings.
>
> F-S
>
>
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com <EVP-ITC%40yahoogroups.com>, "Adrienne"
> <abortree@...> wrote:
> >
> > Hi
> >
> > Thank you for getting back to me. I thought I had destroyed the group by
> accident. Awful feeling!
> >
> > I completely understand and am very grateful that he started this group
> and is willing to share and let share ideas and files. God forbid he should
> leave!! I'm not used to looking at video this way so it would be easy for me
> to miss a lot. I did see the Upside Down Lincoln and the face at the end in
> the second attachment of "If this is the only one..." I need more practice
> and a more open mind, I think. This is all so far reaching. Thank goodness
> he, especially (and the others in this group) are doing this and sharing
> these ideas. Kudos to Frank for all of his work!
> >
> > -Adrienne
> >

> > > > >
> > > > > I'm thinking there is faces embedded in sound, it's related to
> speech, and
> > > > > not just EVP. It seems to be a normal function of our own
> minds(living or
> > > > > dead), the same as reverse speech. I found some faces in old EVPs
> from boxes
> > > > > and also in music files. The ones from Evanescence are pretty
> impressive in
> > > > > person, and do not seem to be intentionaly embedded.
> > > > >
> > > > > I know, it's not ghost hunters, and most don't want to have to
> think.
> > > > > I think most want this stuff in a neat little box, all well

> > > > > Frank-S
> > > > >
> > > > Dear Frank,
> > > >
> > > > I think that I see what you mean. I mean no offense, but I it would
> be helpful to see something a little more definitive that couldn't be
> mistaken for matrixing. Is this possible? Is it just me?
> > > >
> > > > - Adrienne
> > > >
